member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.LicenseManagementClientOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the License Management client.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.LicenseManagementClientOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: The master API key for authenticating with the License Management API. Format: MST_{vendorUlid}_{secret}

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.LicenseManagementClientOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base URL of the License Management API. Default: https://license-management.com/api

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.LicenseManagementClientOptions.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout for HTTP requests in seconds. Default: 30 seconds.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Computer
member.summary: Represents a computer/device that has software installed.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Computer.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier (ULID) of the computer.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Computer.MacAddress
member.summary: The device identifier (typically MAC address or hardware ID).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Computer.Name
member.summary: The friendly name of the computer as seen by users.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License
member.summary: Represents a software license for a specific product and computer.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier (ULID) of the license.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.MaxTrialDays
member.summary: The maximum number of days this license can be used as a trial.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.Expires
member.summary: When this license expires (trial period end or receipt expiration).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.Receipt
member.summary: The receipt indicating this license has been purchased. Null if trial.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.Product
member.summary: The product this license grants access to.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.Computer
member.summary: The computer this license is assigned to.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.IsTrial
member.summary: Whether this is a paid license (has receipt) or trial license.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.License.IsExpired
member.summary: Whether this license has expired.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Product
member.summary: Represents a software product that can be licensed.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Product.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier (ULID) of the product.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Product.Name
member.summary: The name of the product, unique per vendor.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Product.Features
member.summary: List of features this product includes.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Product.Vendor
member.summary: The vendor (maker) of this product.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt
member.summary: Represents a purchase receipt that grants license seats.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier (ULID) of the receipt.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.Code
member.summary: The receipt code - a hash of email and transaction ID used to identify the purchase.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.Qty
member.summary: The number of license seats included in this receipt.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.Product
member.summary: The product this receipt grants a license for.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.BuyerEmail
member.summary: The email address of the customer who purchased the product.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Receipt.Expires
member.summary: The expiration date of this receipt. For subscription products, this is the renewal date.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Vendor
member.summary: Represents a software vendor in the license management system.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Vendor.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier (ULID) of the vendor.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Models.Vendor.Name
member.summary: The official name of the vendor.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateLicenseRequest
member.summary: Request to create a new trial license.

member.summary: The product ID (ULID with PRD_ prefix).

member.summary: The computer ID (ULID with PC_ prefix).

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateProductRequest
member.summary: Request to create a new product.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateProductRequest.Name
member.summary: The name of the product (must be unique per vendor).

member.summary: Request to create a new receipt (purchase record).

member.summary: The number of license seats (computers that can use this receipt).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateReceiptRequest.Product
member.summary: The product ID (ULID with PRD_ prefix).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateReceiptRequest.Code
member.summary: Optional receipt code. If not provided, one will be generated.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateReceiptRequest.BuyerEmail
member.summary: The email address of the customer.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.CreateReceiptRequest.Expires
member.summary: When this receipt expires. For subscription products, this is the renewal date.

member.name: T:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.RegisterComputerRequest
member.summary: Request to register a new computer.

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.RegisterComputerRequest.MacAddress
member.summary: The device identifier (typically MAC address or hardware ID).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.RegisterComputerRequest.Name
member.summary: The friendly name of the computer.

member.summary: Request to update a license (attach or detach a receipt).

member.summary: The license ID (ULID with LIC_ prefix).

member.name: P:LicenseManagement.Client.Requests.UpdateLicenseRequest.Code
member.summary: The receipt code to attach. Set to null to unregister the computer from the license.
